abstract.t: This short memo aims to discuss the different functions andtopological areas of an internetwork, where some kind ofenhancements are required in order to provide predictable end-to-endquality of service (QoS) to customers. These enhancements require(1) the exchange of QoS-related information and (2) enforcement ofQoS-related decisions. This can be, but not necessarily is, done bysome existing or new signaling protocols.
